schema:description:
This photograph album contains 79 black and white photographs which document the activities of the local Davis, California Boy Scout troop from 1922 to 1927. The image subjects include: troop meetings, hikes, and camping, as well as the construction of the Davis Boy Scout Cabin.  To view the album as a single record and to download the entire set of images, go to the "Full Album" record. 

 The collection finding aid is available at [The Online Archive of California] (https://oac.cdlib.org/findaid/ark:/13030/kt5b69r85p/)
schema:name: Davis Boy Scout Troop No. 1 Photograph Album
schema:publisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
